description:
Accomplish more during the chilly seasons. These versatile fleece pants have you covered for a wide range of activities, with articulated construction that allows full range of movement.

  • FUTUREFLEECE™ hollow yarns dry faster and pack smaller than traditional fleece
  • Low-profile, flat elastic waistband feels secure and stretch knit cuffs are comfortable under boots
  • FlashDry™ finish on the fabric improves wicking and reduces drying times
  • Articulated patterning for enhanced mobility
  • Slim-fit layers well and gives a streamlined feel
name: The North Face Summit FUTUREFLEECE Pants - Men's
